Description
BankAccount_S2023_Group6
Bank Account Class
- Contains constructor, getters, and setters for Bank Account
- Superclass
CheckingAccount_S2023_Group6
Checking Account Class
- Extends Bank Account Class
- Contains constructor for Checking Account
- Contains methods for depositing and withdrawing funds, as well as charging fees
CheckingAccountJunitTest
 
DoubleValidiationException
 
Extensions
Extensions Class
- Responsible for validating input and perfoming cryptographic constructions throughout the application - Contains methods for validating each data type used in the application - Contains method for generating a random account number - Contains methods for encrypting and decrypting a given String - Contains method for generating an AES key for encryption and decryption based on the user password
InvalidInputException
 
LargeDepositException
Large Deposit Exception
- As per Bank policy: Exception is thrown when a deposit into a Checking or Savings Account exceeds $1,000,000
- Extends Exception superclass
- Secure Software Design Decision
Main
Main Class
- Houses the UI
- Responsible for saving and loading data
- Responsible for all encryption/decryption of saved data
NegativeBalanceException
Negative Balance Exception
- As per Bank Policy: Exception is thrown when the account balance of a Checking or Savings Account is negative
- Extends Exception superclass
- Secure Software Design Decision
SavingsAccount_S2023_Group6
Savings Account Class
- Extends Bank Account Class
- Contains constructor for Savings Account
- Contains methods for depositing and withdrawing funds, as well as charging fees
